Division.Name: Standard
Division.Titles: 2 Qualifying Legs May be earned under 1 judge.
1 Qualifying Leg each of Colors and Wildcard May be earned under 1 judge.
1 Qualifying Leg each of Snooker and Jackpot May be earned under 1 judge.
1 Qualifying Leg each of FullHouse and Jumpers May be earned under 1 judge.
2 Clean Q Legs, or 3 Qualifying Legs May be earned under 1 judge.
2 Qualifying Legs each of Colors and Wildcard Earned under at least 2 different judges for the 4 legs combined.
2 Qualifying Legs each of Snooker and Jackpot Earned under at least 2 different judges for the 4 legs combined.
2 Qualifying Legs each of FullHouse and Jumpers Earned under at least 2 different judges for the 4 legs combined.
3 Clean Q Legs, or 4 Qualifying Legs May be earned under 1 judge.
2 Qualifying Legs each of Colors and Wildcard Earned under at least 2 different judges for the 4 legs combined.
2 Qualifying Legs each of Snooker and Jackpot Earned under at least 2 different judges for the 4 legs combined.
2 Qualifying Legs each of FullHouse and Jumpers Earned under at least 2 different judges for the 4 legs combined.
4 Clean Q Legs, or 5 Qualifying Legs Earned under at least 2 different judges.
2 Qualifying Legs each of Colors and Wildcard Earned under at least 2 different judges for the 4 legs combined.
2 Qualifying Legs each of Snooker and Jackpot Earned under at least 2 different judges for the 4 legs combined.
2 Qualifying Legs each of FullHouse and Jumpers Earned under at least 2 different judges for the 4 legs combined.
Standard: 8 Clean Q Legs or 10 Qualifying Legs Earned under at least 4 different judges Games: 4 Qualifying Legs of each game Earned under at least 2 different judges for each game.

5000 points, 3000 by class requirements, 2000 by handler choice. Standard: 500 pts (20 legs) Colors: 300 pts (20 legs) Wildcard: 400 pts (20 legs) Jackpot: 500 pts (20 legs) Snooker: 500 pts (20 legs) FullHouse: 400 pts (20 legs) Jumpers: 400 pts (20 legs)

Division.Name: Junior
Division.Titles: 3 qualifying legs. They may or may not be with the same dog, and may or may not be in the same level.
8 clean or 10 qualifying legs in Level 5.

Division.Name: Specialist
Division.Titles: Will need to obtain a total of 750 points, which must include at least 4 legs in 4 of the 7 classes offered by CPE, handler choice.
Will need to obtain a total of 2500 points. All points and legs from the Specialist Champion count towards the Specialist Extraordinaire totals.

Scoring.Note: Faults allowed: 1 bar down 5 time faults
Faults allowed: 1 bar down 5 time faults
Faults allowed: 1 off course 1 bar down 5 time faults
Faults allowed: 1 off course 1 bar down 5 time faults
Faults allowed: 1 off course 1 bar down 5 time faults

Event.Name: Colors
Event.Desc: Successfully run your choice of one of the three over-lapping mini-agility courses on the same field.

Scoring.Note: Faults allowed: 3 time faults
Faults allowed: 3 time faults
Faults allowed: 4 time faults
Faults allowed: 1 off course 4 time faults
Faults allowed: 1 off course 5 time faults

Event.Name: Wildcard
Event.Desc: Successfully complete the course including enough "wildcards" to qualify!

Scoring.Note: WildCard: 1 1pt, 2 2pt
WildCard: 1 1pt, 2 2pt Faults allowed: 1 bar down 3 time faults
WildCard: 1 1pt, 2 2pt Faults allowed: 1 bar down 3 time faults
WildCard: 1 1pt, 2 2pt Faults allowed: 1 bar down 4 time faults
WildCard: 2 1pt, 1 2pt Faults allowed: 1 off course 1 bar down 4 time faults
WildCard: 2 1pt, 1 2pt Faults allowed: 1 off course 1 bar down 5 time faults

Event.Name: Snooker
Event.Desc: To test the course planning strategies of the handler, and the dog's ability to concentrate on and execute the handlers directions.

Event.Name: Jackpot
Event.Desc: To test the course planning strategies of the handler, and the dog's ability to work at a distance.

Event.Name: FullHouse
Event.Desc: Successfully accumulate required points for your respective level, that includes a pair, three of a kind and a joker, before the whistle. 3 of a kind: 3 jumps (1 pt each) 2 of a kind: 2 "circles" (3 pts each) joker: 1 contact, weaves, broad, double, triple (5 pts each)

Event.Name: Jumpers
Event.Desc: Successfully complete course within fault limits and course time.

Scoring.Note: Faults allowed: 1 bar down 5 time faults
Faults allowed: 1 bar down 5 time faults
Faults allowed: 1 off course 1 bar down 5 time faults
Faults allowed: 1 off course 1 bar down 5 time faults
Faults allowed: 1 off course 1 bar down 5 time faults

3 qualifying scores earned under at least 2 different judges.
3 qualifying scores earned under at least 2 different judges.
